LanguageData.Mizu_ClearWaterFilter.label: Clear water filter
LanguageData.Mizu_ClearWaterFilter.description: Convert normal water to clear water in waterworks. Need electrical power.
LanguageData.Mizu_ClearWaterFilterIndustrial.label: Industrial clear water filter
LanguageData.Mizu_ClearWaterFilterIndustrial.descript: Convert normal water to clear water in waterworks. Need electrical power. 10x effective.
LanguageData.Mizu_DirtyWaterFilter.label: Dirty water filter
LanguageData.Mizu_DirtyWaterFilter.description: Convert raw/mud/sea water to normal water in waterworks. Need electrical power.
LanguageData.Mizu_DirtyWaterFilterIndustrial.label: Industrial dirty water filter
LanguageData.Mizu_DirtyWaterFilterIndustrial.descript: Convert raw/mud/sea water to normal water in waterworks. Need electrical power. 10x effective.
LanguageData.Mizu_DrawingWaterSpot.label: Drawing water spot
LanguageData.Mizu_DrawingWaterSpot.description: A place for drawing water. This can be built on water or marsh.
LanguageData.Mizu_ElectricWaterCleaner.label: Electric water purifier
LanguageData.Mizu_FueledWaterCleaner.label: Fueled water purifier
LanguageData.Mizu_GroundWaterPump.label: Ground water pump
LanguageData.Mizu_GroundWaterPump.description: A building for pumping water for river, lake, pond, sea and marsh. Need electrical power.
LanguageData.Mizu_IceHarvestingSpot.label: Ice harvesting spot
LanguageData.Mizu_IceHarvestingSpot.description: A place for harvesting ice. This can be built on ice.
LanguageData.Mizu_SprinklerExtinguishing.label: Sprinkler (extinguishing)
LanguageData.Mizu_SprinklerExtinguishing.description: Automatically extinguish fire within range. Need electrical power.
LanguageData.Mizu_SprinklerGrowing.label: Sprinkler (growing)
LanguageData.Mizu_SprinklerGrowing.description: Water farm every morning. Need electrical power.
LanguageData.Mizu_UndergroundWaterPumpDeep.label: Underground water pump (deep)
LanguageData.Mizu_UndergroundWaterPumpDeep.descriptio: A building for pumping water for underground deep layer. Need electrical power.
LanguageData.Mizu_UndergroundWaterPumpShallow.label: Underground water pump (shallow)
LanguageData.Mizu_UndergroundWaterPumpShallow.descrip: A building for pumping water for underground shallow layer. Need electrical power.
LanguageData.Mizu_WaterBox.label: Water box
LanguageData.Mizu_WaterBox.description: A topless facility for storing small amount of water. It allows animals to drink water.
LanguageData.Mizu_WaterFaucet.label: Faucet
LanguageData.Mizu_WaterFaucet.description: In use this tool, you take water for drinking from water tank.
LanguageData.Mizu_WaterPipe.label: Water pipe
LanguageData.Mizu_WaterPipe.description: A building for connecting water network tools (pump, tank, faucet ...)
LanguageData.Mizu_WaterPipeInWater.label: Water pipe (in water)
LanguageData.Mizu_WaterPipeInWater.description: A building for connecting water network tools (pump, tank, faucet ...)
LanguageData.Mizu_WaterTank.label: Water tank
LanguageData.Mizu_WaterValve.label: Water valve
LanguageData.Mizu_WaterValve.description: A building for connect water network. You can switch state (open/close).
LanguageData.Mizu_Well.label: Well
LanguageData.Mizu_Well.description: A building for drawing underground water.
